state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, venture west. Then, try to travel north. After that, make an attempt to head east. Once you finish that, make an effort to venture east. Then, venture south. After that, go to the east. If you can manage that, go to the north. After that, try to move west. With that done, make an attempt to take a trip west. Then, venture north. With that accomplished, go west. Then, take a trip south. And then, travel east. With that done, travel south. That done, recover the coin from the floor of the scullery. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Spare Room =- You find yourself in a spare room. An usual one. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Spare Room =-0/1

-= Recreation Zone =- You find yourself in a normal kind of place. That is to say, you're in a recreation zone. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. > -= Recreation Zone =-0/2

-= Study =- You're now in a study. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Study =-0/3

-= Office =- You find yourself in an office. A typical kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Office =-0/4

-= Laundry Place =- Wow! You're in a laundry place. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Laundry Place =-0/5
-= Shower =- Here we are in the shower. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Shower =-0/6

-= Garage =- You've just shown up in a garage. You start to take note of what's in the room. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Garage =-0/7
-= Bathroom =- You're now in the bathroom. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Bathroom =-0/8
-= Cubicle =- You're now in a cubicle. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Cubicle =-0/9

-= Bedroom =- You find yourself in a bedroom. An ordinary kind of place. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north. > -= Bedroom =-0/10
-= Basement =- You are in a basement. An usual one. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Basement =-0/11

-= Cookery =- You are in a cookery. A typical one. You start to take note of what's in the room. There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Cookery =-0/12
-= Chamber =- Well, here we are in the chamber. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Chamber =-0/13
-= Lounge =- You find yourself in a lounge. A standard kind of place. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west. > -= Lounge =-0/14

-= Scullery =- You find yourself in a scullery. An usual kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is a coin on the floor. > -= Scullery =-0/15
